channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 9 Best Curling Irons of 2025, Tested for All Hair Types
item.description: We tested the top curling irons on the market, and here are the ones that made the cut.

item.title: LG’s Integrated TV Ad Tech Analyzes Your Emotions
item.description: LG has licensed tech that claims to interpret TV users’ feelings and convictions. The company will use this data to more directly target the ads it’s ...

item.title: OpenAI pursued Cursor maker before entering into talks to buy Windsurf for $3B

item.title: Apple iPad (A16, 2025) Review: Brilliantly Basic
item.description: Apple’s 2025 iPad refresh doesn’t bring anything new to the table, but it’s still the best tablet for most people.

item.title: DOGE Has Access to Sensitive Labor Department Data on Immigrants and Farm Workers

item.title: Carbon removal startup Holocene bought by oil and gas giant Occidental
item.description: The deal was executed through Oxy Low Carbon Ventures for an undisclosed amount.

item.title: Ramp is trying to get the US government as a customer after seeing a tweet from DOGE

item.title: Defense tech Theseus landed Y Combinator, the US Special Forces, and $4.3M from a tweet

item.title: The CFPB Has Been Gutted
item.description: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau terminated the positions of 1,406 employees at the congressionally mandated agency.

item.title: OpenAI launches Flex processing for cheaper, slower AI tasks
